container-title: Also we indicate 2010 Mathematics Subject Classification. Primary 82B23, Secondary 33E99. Key words and phrases. Elliptic beta integrals, integrable systems, statistical mechanics
note: Work was supported in part by Russian foundation for basic research (RFBR grant no. 09-01-00271).
title: In the present paper we discuss relations between a new class of special functions, called elliptic hypergeometric functions, and solvable models of statistical mechanics. We describe the most complicated known integrable systems defined on 2d (two-dimensional) lattices representing continuous spin generalizations of the well known Ising model and its various extensions. Actually, these novel integrable models correspond to some discretized 2d quantum field theories
